title: Nas Daily: DISASTER IN MEXICO CITY! 災難強襲墨西哥市! (中文字幕)

json.text: hi today is 7.1 magnitude earthquake hit Mexico City one of the strongest in the
city's history my friends my girlfriend and I are all
safe in fact today I was near the border of the US very far from danger but I'm
taking the first flight back to Mexico City because for many people there
including my girlfriend they were in real danger
our hotel has suffered serious damage the bedroom is all shaken up glass is on
the floor walls are all cracked up rivers have turned into potions entire
buildings nearby where a hundred and fifty people died including
schoolchildren and many more are still trapped I think my brother is here this
is a real disaster danger is not over yet and there might be more earthquakes
keep your thoughts and prayers with the people of Mexico that's what a minute
see you tomorrow from Mexico City
